functional_units.name: tfhd Track Fragment Header Parser
functional_units.description: Parses tfhd boxes in ISO media files and surfaces structured metadata for each track fragment.

functional_units.name: CLI Console Formatter Extension
functional_units.description: Formats parsed box data into human‑readable console output, including tfhd details.

functional_units.name: JSON Parse Tree Exporter
functional_units.description: Exports the full parse tree of ISO boxes to JSON, regenerating DASH segment snapshots.

functional_units.name: DASH Segment Snapshot Regeneration
functional_units.description: Recreates a snapshot of a DASH segment in JSON format from parsed box data.

functional_units.name: Parser Unit Tests for tfhd
functional_units.description: Automated tests validating correct parsing of tfhd boxes.

functional_units.name: Console Formatter Unit Tests
functional_units.description: Tests ensuring console output correctly reflects parsed data.
